#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
main()
{
    int t1;cin>>t1;
     while(t1!=0)
     {
        t1--;
        int n;cin>>n;
        int i,j=0,s,k=0;
        int t=n;
         while(t!=0)
         {
             t=t/10;j++;
         }
         
        for(i=n-1;i>=n-j*9;i--)
        {
              s=0;t=i;
           while(t!=0)
           {
                s+=t%10;
                t=t/10;
           }
           if(s==n-i)
           {
              k=i;
           }
         }
         if(k!=0)
            cout<<k<<endl;
         else
            cout<<"NONE"<<endl;
      }
}
